passages.text:
You’re traveling through the fabric the Jexi Fractal Zone when, without warning, everything around you begins to distort. The air ripples as space and time swap places. The ground beneath you feels both distant and immediate, and the sky seems to stretch inward like a hallway.

Suddenly, you find yourself standing still in a landscape that seems frozen—except time is flowing backward. You can hear the echo of past conversations, but none of the people are in sight. In front of you, a road seems to stretch backward into the past.
[[Try to move forward, even if time runs in reverse->Neutral Ending]]

[[Use magic to stabilize space and time->Good Ending]]

[[Stay still and observe the unfolding scene->Bad Ending]]

links.name: Try to move forward, even if time runs in reverse
Use magic to stabilize space and time
Stay still and observe the unfolding scene

passages.name: Passaggio senza titolo

passages.text:
You focus your magic and attempt to stabilize the shifting dimensions. With a few murmured incantations, you manage to regain control of the space-time distortion, slowly restoring order. Time flows normally again, and the ground beneath you feels solid. You’ve managed to right the world, but you can’t shake the feeling that something still lingers in the air, waiting for another shift.

[[Continue...]]
passages.name: Good Ending

passages.text:
You push forward, despite the strange reversal of time. As you move, everything around you blurs, and soon you’re lost in an endless loop, both stuck in the present and pulled into the past. You feel trapped between moments, but eventually, you break free, returning to a semblance of normalcy—only with no clear memory of what happened.
[[Continue...]]
passages.name: Neutral Ending

passages.text:
You stay still, trying to understand the bizarre scene unfolding around you. But the distortion grows worse. Time stretches and collapses, and you feel yourself pulled into an endless loop of fragmented moments. The world warps around you, leaving you unsure if you’re stuck in the past or the future.

[[Continue...]]
passages.name: Bad Ending
